alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 10:28PM CST until January 11 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... South central Conway County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1115 PM CST. * At 1027 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adona, or near Perryville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Maumelle... Perryville... Mayflower... Perry... Adona... Houston... Little Italy... Roland in Pulaski County... Toad Suck... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Bigelow... Aplin... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Palarm... Natural Steps... Oak Grove in Perry County... Thornburg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas.
